event.title: 1686, the city of Buda in Hungary was conquered

data.event: In 1686, the city of Buda in Hungary was conquered from the Turks.
When Vauban in 1690 and 1698 developed the new fortifications around the Buda Island in Courtray, people said they had built a little Buda over here, near the existing Broel Towers.

event.title: the first times in the city archives in 1734

data.event: This name was kept alive among the inhabitants of the city and was found for the first times in the city archives in 1734.
